verbose_text: In this study, in order to prevent acid leaching from the high temperature PEFC system, we used poly (vinylphosphonic acid) (PVPA) in place of PA because PVPA is a polymeric acid and is stably bound to the PBIs via multipoint acid-base reactions XREF_BIBR.
evidence: prevent acid leaching from the high temperature PEFC system, we used poly(vinylphosphonic acid) (PVPA) in place of PA
